attributes.action: commission a full public inquiry into the case of Baby P, and prevent Sharon Shoesmith from carrying out any investigation into the failure of her own department. We also call for the resignation of Sharon Shoesmith and the social workers who failed to carry out their public duty in this case.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not acceptable to have an internal investigation into Baby P's death. Sharon Shoesmith must not be allowed to investigate the failure of her own department.

There has been a total service failure  by Haringey Social Services in this case. The department must be held to account for its failures that caused the prolonged suffering and death of Baby P.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
